dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.bi.BusinessInteractionItemPrice
dataStructure.description:
An amount associated with an BusinessInteractionItem that is valued by the associated ProductOfferingPrice.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: BusinessInteractionItemPrice

child.name: quantity
child.description:
The portion of the Business Interaction Item quantity that is valued by a price.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: quantity

child.name: price
child.description:
A one-time price, not included as an available product offering price, associated with a business interaction item.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: price

child.name: description
child.description:
Narrative that explains the price that can include a reason why a price was overridden.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description
